item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Brian Ferry/Robert Palmer/Pretenders Best Of Albums
item.description:
Hello my Dear Music friends,

I was hoping someone has the following greatest Hits albums in her or his collection.

Brian Ferry - Roxy Music Platinum Collection

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/platinum-collection-bryan-ferry-roxy-music/0724357122955

Robert Palmer At His Very Best

https://www.allmusic.com/album/at-his-very-best-mw0000465303

The Best of the Pretenders

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/the-best-of-the-pretenders-pretenders/0825646865390

Thanks a million my favourite Music stars !
item.author: Jim King
